docs.lead_paragraph: An Arizona inmate and his wife have been indicted on terrorism and conspiracy charges in connection with a plot to build and explode a homemade bomb inside a state prison, court documents made public on Thursday showed.

docs.lead_paragraph: Alaska Airlines said today that it had canceled 48 flights in the past two days after grounding 17 of its 34 MD-80 aircraft for inspections. Those planes are the same model as the one that crashed off the Southern California coast in January, killing 88 people, when a part in the tail section malfunctioned. Alaska said it acted after finding that a measurement tool made by the airline to monitor wear on the tail part had produced inconsistent readings, meaning that it might have failed to detect unacceptable wear in a control mechanism called a jackscrew. A factor in the January crash is believed to be problems with the plane's jackscrew, which had been checked with a tool made by the airline.
docs.abstract: Alaska Airlines cancels 48 flights in two days after grounding 17 of its 34 MD-80 aircraft for inspections; found that a measurement tool made by airline to monitor wear on tail part produced inconsistent readings, meaning that it might fail to detect unacceptable wear in a control mechanism called a Jackscrew (M)
